lead_paragraph: KARPMAN--Esther, 98, of New York City, passed away on July 20th, 2016. She is survived by two daughters, Dahlia Japhet, and Diana Karpman and a son, Daniel Karpman and five grandchildren. A native of Warsaw, she previously lived in Tel Aviv, Israel. Funeral services will be held on Monday, July 25 at 9:30am at Plaza Jewish Community Chapel. 1/3
